items.question: How do diginuCashBack levels and commissions work?
aliases: how much do I earn from my team cashback
items.answer:
Here’s the scoop on diginuCashBack levels! 💛 The Value membership (R59) doesn’t qualify for membership commissions, but the Pro (R99) and Pro Annual (R999) do. You earn from your team up to 5 levels deep — here’s how it breaks down:

👉 **When a Value Member (R59)** joins:
• Level 1 – R7.50
• Level 2 – R3
• Level 3 – R2.25
• Level 4 – R1.50
• Level 5 – R0.75

👉 **When a Pro Member (R99)** joins:
• Level 1 – R15
• Level 2 – R6
• Level 3 – R4.50
• Level 4 – R3.50
• Level 5 – R1.50

👉 **When a Pro Annual (R999)** joins:
• Level 1 – R150
• Level 2 – R60
• Level 3 – R45
• Level 4 – R35
• Level 5 – R15

Now that’s what we call teamwork that pays off! **Remember that this is on their active membership and if your membership is active. These are recurring Monthly commissions... ✨**
followups: How does diginuCashBack work with diginu Food orders? (cashback-016)

items.question: What is diginuEgo?
items.answer: diginuEgo is an AI-powered electric motorbike designed for modern mobility in Africa. It pairs smart security and live tracking with practical daily performance, making it ideal for commuting, delivery work, and fleet use. aliases: how to cash out from diginuPay

items.answer: You can withdraw cash from your diginuPay wallet using a cashout voucher sent to your phone. Here’s how it works: Open your diginuPay app and request a cash withdrawal You will receive an SMS with a Nedbank MobiMoney voucher code Go to any supported store or ATM and use the voucher to withdraw cash Where you can withdraw: Nedbank ATMs Checkers, Shoprite, Pick n Pay, OK, Usave, Boxer & House and Home Kazang partner stores nationwide diginuPay is integrated with Nedbank MobiMoney , giving you thousands of withdrawal locations across South Africa for easy access.

items.question: What is the diginuPSP business model?
items.answer: diginuPSP is a people-driven business model created by diginu CEO Jessie Bester to uplift others through shared success. Instead of spending millions on traditional advertising, diginu avoids upfront marketing costs and shares a portion of its profit with the people who help grow the platform by enrolling customers. This means marketing money is only paid **after a sale happens**, not before. As a result, customers get **more affordable products**, and everyday people have the opportunity to **earn income** through the diginuPSP system.

Marketing spend happens after a sale, not before, which helps keep products more affordable for customers.

items.question: What are the 2 ways to earn in diginuPSP?
items.answer:
diginuPSP (Profit Share Program) offers two earning opportunities:

  • Customer side: You earn commissions when customers join diginu using your referral link and place orders. These earnings are based on a 5-generation structure.
  • Merchant side: You can also earn when merchants onboard through your referrals and generate sales.

This section explains the customer (delivery) side only.

See also: How do I earn from customers? · What are PSP generations?

aliases: how to earn money with diginu

items.question: How do I earn from customers on the delivery side?
items.answer:
You earn by referring new customers to diginu through your unique referral link. When they join and place orders, you receive commission from the goods they purchase. These earnings are paid on up to five generations of referrals under you.

This applies to customer-side (delivery) PSP earnings only.

See also: What are PSP generations? · How does the 5-generation system work?
followups: What are generations in diginuPSP? (psp-009)
How does the 5-generation earning system work? (psp-010)
aliases: how to earn commissions on orders

items.question: What are generations in diginuPSP?
items.answer:
In diginuPSP, a generation refers to how far a referral is from you in the earning structure. When you enroll someone, that person is Generation 1. If they enroll someone, that new person becomes Generation 2, and so on — up to Generation 5.

This allows you to earn from the activity of people you introduced and those they introduce, creating a long-term income stream.

This structure applies to customer-side PSP earnings only.

See also: How does the 5-generation earning system work? · What percentage do I earn per generation?
followups: How does the 5-generation PSP earning system work? (psp-010)
What percentage commission do I earn per generation? (psp-011)

items.question: How does the 5-generation PSP earning system work?
items.answer:
With diginuPSP, you earn commission up to five generations deep from customers who joined using your referral link. When your direct referral orders, you earn from their purchase. You also earn smaller percentages from the orders of people they referred, up to five generations away.

This ensures that your network’s ongoing activity can create a recurring income stream over time.

These commissions apply to customer-side (delivery) PSP earnings only.

See also: What percentage commission do I earn per generation? · What part of the order qualifies for PSP earnings?
followups: What percentage commission do I earn per generation? (psp-011)
What part of a customer order qualifies for PSP commission? (psp-012)

items.question: What percentage commission do I earn per generation?
items.answer:
diginuPSP pays out a total of 1% commission on the goods purchased (excluding delivery, admin fees, and tips). This 1% is split across five generations as follows:

  • 0.5% on Generation 1
  • 0.2% on Generation 2
  • 0.15% on Generation 3
  • 0.10% on Generation 4
  • 0.05% on Generation 5

These rates apply to customer-side PSP commissions only.

See also: How does the 5-generation system work? · What part of the order qualifies for PSP earnings?
followups: How does the 5-generation system work? (psp-010)
What part of a customer order qualifies for PSP commission? (psp-012)

items.question: What part of a customer order qualifies for PSP commission?
items.answer:
PSP commission is calculated only on the total value of goods purchased by the customer. The following charges are excluded from commission calculations:

  • Delivery fees
  • Admin fees
  • Tips

This rule applies to customer-side PSP commissions only.

See also: What percentage commission do I earn per generation?
followups: What percentage commission do I earn per generation? (psp-011)

items.question: What is the difference between diginu and network marketing or MLM?
items.answer:
diginu is not an MLM or network marketing company. Traditional MLMs usually require people to:

  • Buy starter packages to join
  • Make monthly product purchases to stay active
  • Pay annual renewal or membership fees

diginu is different. With diginu:

  • Signup is 100% free
  • No monthly purchases are required to qualify for commission
  • No renewal fees or joining kits

Think of diginu as a referral program on steroids. Instead of giving customers small discounts, we share real cash earnings when you refer people. We also split 1% of all turnover back into the community as referral commission, paid over 5 generations to allow teamwork and shared growth.
followups: Is diginu a pyramid scheme? (psp-015)
How do I earn with diginuPSP? (psp-002)
How does the 5-generation PSP earning system work? (psp-010)

items.question: Is diginu a pyramid scheme?
items.answer:
No — diginu is not a pyramid scheme. Pyramid and chain distribution schemes are illegal in South Africa under the Consumer Protection Act (CPA) No. 68 of 2008, Section 43. diginu fully complies with South African law.

Here’s why diginu is legal and legitimate:

  • We provide real products & services: diginu is a live delivery platform for food, groceries and essentials. Revenue comes from real customer orders — not recruitment fees.
  • No joining fees: It is 100% free to join diginu and earn from referrals. This complies with Section 43(2) of the CPA.
  • No compulsory purchases: You don’t need to buy products monthly or pay to qualify for earnings.
  • Commission is paid from real revenue: Earnings come from actual sales, not sign-up fees.
  • Referring is optional: Anyone can use diginu just as a customer, with no obligation to refer others.

diginu simply chooses to share marketing profit with its users through the diginuPSP (Profit Share Program), instead of paying big corporations for advertising. Think of it as a referral program on steroids — with jet fuel added 🚀.
followups: What is the difference between diginu and network marketing or MLM? (psp-014)
What is diginuPSP? (psp-001)
How do I earn with diginuPSP? (psp-002)

items.question: What does the word diginu mean?
items.answer:
The name diginu comes from combining two words:

  • digi – from digital
  • nu – from menu

So digi(tal) + (me)nu = diginu. It represents a digital menu and ordering platform designed for the modern world.

items.question: How do I get to Diamond in diginu?
items.answer:
At diginu, we honour people who achieve success in the team. You can qualify for **Diamond Rank** in **two different ways** — either through **customer signups** or through **merchants you launch**:
  • Diamond Club Member: 100 personally enrolled customers or 10 merchants live
  • Diamond 25: 250 personally enrolled customers or 25 merchants live
  • Diamond 50: 500 personally enrolled customers or 50 merchants live
  • Diamond 100: 1000 personally enrolled customers or 100 merchants live
Both customer signups and merchant launches count towards your rank, so you can grow whichever side of the business suits you best.
aliases: how do I get to diamond
how to rank up in diginu
followups: How do I find my referral link to start signing people up? (psp-013)

items.question: What benefits are there to being a Diamond member in diginu?

  • ✅ Direct access to top diginu leaders
  • ✅ Personal guidance and mentorship
  • ✅ Early access to company updates
  • ✅ Ability to give input on company progress

Important: Before joining the Diamond WhatsApp group, you must sign a Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA).

items.question: How do I set up diginuPay?
items.answer:
If you recently registered with diginu, your diginuPay wallet is already created automatically. All you need to do is:
  1. Download the diginuPay app from the app store
  2. Log in using the same email and password as your diginu account

items.question: I have been registered for a while and never used diginuPay, what should I do?
items.answer:
If you joined diginu before June 2025 and never activated your diginuPay wallet, follow these steps:
  1. Log in at diginu.com
  2. Click on eWallet in the left menu
  3. Fill in the activation form and submit
  4. Then download the diginuPay app and log in
followups: Why do I get an error when trying to register my diginuPay eWallet? (diginupay-ewallet-error)

items.question: Why do I get an error when trying to register my diginuPay eWallet?
items.answer:
If you see an error while trying to register your eWallet, it means you already have a diginuPay wallet linked to your account. All you need to do is:
  1. Download the diginuPay app
  2. Log in using the same email and password as your diginu account
followups: I had a diginuPay wallet before, what should I do? (diginupay-existing-wallet)

items.question: I had a diginuPay wallet before, what should I do?
items.answer:
If you previously had a diginuPay wallet, you don’t need to register again. Simply:
  1. Download the diginuPay app
  2. Log in with your diginu email and password

If you forgot your password, use ‘Forgot Password’ on the login screen.

followups: Do I need to do KYC on diginuPay? (diginupay-kyc)

items.question: Do I need to do KYC on diginuPay?
items.answer:
Yes, to unlock full wallet features, you must complete KYC. You can submit your KYC documents inside the diginuPay app:
  1. Open the app
  2. Tap the ☰ menu (three lines) in the top left
  3. Select KYC and upload your documents
